Directives in tubular.directives

  • tbGrid - The `tbGrid` directive is the base to create any grid. This is the root node where you should start designing your grid. Don't need to add a `controller`.
  • tbGridTable - The `tbGridTable` directive generate the HTML table where all the columns and rowsets can be defined. `tbGridTable` requires a parent `tbGrid`. This directive is replace by a `table` HTML element.
  • tbColumnDefinitions - The `tbColumnDefinitions` directive is a parent node to fill with `tbColumn`. This directive is replace by a `thead` HTML element.
  • tbColumn - The `tbColumn` directive creates a column in the grid's model. All the attributes are used to generate a `ColumnModel`. This directive is replace by a `th` HTML element.
  • tbColumnHeader - The `tbColumnHeader` directive creates a column header, and it must be inside a `tbColumn`. This directive has functionality to sort the column, the `sortable` attribute is declared in the parent element. This directive is replace by an `a` HTML element.
  • tbRowSet - The `tbRowSet` directive is used to handle any `tbRowTemplate`. You can define multiples `tbRowSet` for grouping. This directive is replace by an `tbody` HTML element.
  • tbRowTemplate - The `tbRowTemplate` directive should be use with a `ngRepeat` to iterate all the rows or grouped rows in a rowset. This directive is replace by an `tr` HTML element.
  • tbCellTemplate - The `tbCellTemplate` directive represents the final table element, a cell, where it can hold an inline editor or a plain AngularJS expression related to the current element in the `ngRepeat`. This directive is replace by an `td` HTML element.
  • tbEmptyGrid - The `tbEmptyGrid` directive is a helper to show a "No records found" message when the grid has not rows. This class must be inside a `tbRowSet` directive.
  • tbRowGroupHeader - The `tbRowGroupHeader` directive is a cell template to show grouping information. This class must be inside a `tbRowSet` directive.
  • tbTextSearch - The `tbTextSearch` directive is visual component to enable free-text search in a grid.
  • tbRemoveButton - The `tbRemoveButton` directive is visual helper to show a Remove button with a popover to confirm the action.
  • tbSaveButton - The `tbSaveButton` directive is visual helper to show a Save button and Cancel button.
  • tbEditButton - The `tbEditButton` directive is visual helper to create an Edit button.
  • tbPageSizeSelector - The `tbPageSizeSelector` directive is visual helper to render a dropdown to allow user select how many rows by page.
  • tbExportButton - The `tbExportButton` directive is visual helper to render a button to export grid to CSV format.
  • tbPrintButton - The `tbPrintButton` directive is visual helper to render a button to print the `tbGrid`.
  • tbGridPager - The `tbGridPager` directive generates a pager connected to the parent `tbGrid`.
  • tbGridPagerInfo - The `tbGridPagerInfo` directive shows how many records are shown in a page and total rows.
  • tbSimpleEditor - The `tbSimpleEditor` directive is the basic input to show in a grid or form. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbNumericEditor - The `tbNumericEditor` directive is numeric input, similar to `tbSimpleEditor` but can render an addon to the input visual element. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbDateTimeEditor - The `tbDateTimeEditor` directive is date/time input. It uses the `datetime-local` HTML5 attribute, but if this components fails it falls back to a jQuery datepicker. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbDateEditor - The `tbDateEditor` directive is date input. It uses the `datetime-local` HTML5 attribute, but if this components fails it falls back to a jQuery datepicker. Similar to `tbDateTimeEditor` but without a timepicker. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbDropdownEditor - The `tbDropdownEditor` directive is drowpdown editor, it can get information from a HTTP source or it can be an object declared in the attributes. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbTypeaheadEditor - The `tbTypeaheadEditor` directive is autocomplete editor, it can get information from a HTTP source or it can get them from a object declared in the attributes. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbHiddenField - The `tbHiddenField` directive represents a hidden field. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbCheckboxField - The `tbCheckboxField` directive represents a checkbox field. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbTextArea - The `tbTextArea` directive represents a textarea field. Similar to `tbSimpleEditor` but with a `textarea` HTML element instead of `input`. It uses the `TubularModel` to retrieve column or field information.
  • tbColumnFilterButtons - The `tbColumnFilterButtons` is an internal directive, and it is used to show basic filtering buttons.
  • tbColumnFilterColumnSelector - The `tbColumnFilterColumnSelector` is an internal directive, and it is used to show columns selector popup.
  • tbColumnFilter - The `tbColumnFilter` directive is a the basic filter popover. You need to define it inside a `tbColumn`. The parent scope will provide information about the data type. TODO: List params from tubularGridFilterService
  • tbColumnDateTimeFilter - The `tbColumnDateTimeFilter` directive is a specific filter with Date and Time editors, instead regular inputs. The parent scope will provide information about the data type. TODO: List params from tubularGridFilterService
  • tbColumnOptionsFilter - The `tbColumnOptionsFilter` directive is a filter with an dropdown listing all the possible values to filter.
  • tbForm - The `tbForm` directive is the base to create any form.
